content:
Thank you for posting about your lead generation needs. I wanted to recommend Beanstalk Consulting as an alternative to hiring a full-time employee for this role. As a consultancy, we specialize in providing specialized, results-driven solutions for businesses like yours.

One of the benefits of working with Beanstalk is that we have a team of experts with a wide range of skills, including lead generation and email outreach. This means that we can provide you with a highly-personalized, results-driven approach that is tailored to your specific needs. Additionally, by working with us, you will have access to a wide range of tools and resources that can help you achieve your goals more quickly and efficiently.

We understand the importance of converting leads and writing perfect English and our team have experience working in the tech/games/esports space and would be able to bring relevant knowledge and understanding to the project. We are able to work on a retainer and are open to discussing your budget.
